<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Crash recovery helper object.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class implements support for running operations in a safe context so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that crashes (memory errors, stack overflow, assertion violations) can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// detected and control restored to the crashing thread. Crash detection is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// purely &quot;best effort&quot;, the exact set of failures which can be recovered from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is platform dependent.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Clients make use of this code by first calling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// CrashRecoveryContext::Enable(), and then executing unsafe operations via a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// CrashRecoveryContext object. For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    void actual&#95;work(void &#42;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    void foo() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      CrashRecoveryContext CRC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      if (!CRC.RunSafely(actual&#95;work, 0)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         ... a crash was detected, report error to user ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      ... no crash was detected ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// To assist recovery the class allows specifying set of actions that will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// executed in any case, whether crash occurs or not. These actions may be used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to reclaim resources in the case of crash.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/crashrecoverycontext"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/crashrecoverycontext/#af9b65412e2f06422a5500e533cb3982d">CrashRecoveryContext</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for regular crashes. When this is active, a crash would print the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper class for managing resource cleanups.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\tparam T Type of resource been reclaimed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\tparam Cleanup Class that defines how the resource is reclaimed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Clients create objects of this type in the code executed in a crash recovery</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// context to ensure that the resource will be reclaimed even in the case of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// crash. For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    void actual&#95;work(void &#42;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Resource&gt; R(new Resource());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      CrashRecoveryContextCleanupRegistrar D(R.get());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    void foo() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      CrashRecoveryContext CRC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      if (!CRC.RunSafely(actual&#95;work, 0)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         ... a crash was detected, report error to user ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If the code of &#96;actual&#95;work&#96; in the example above does not crash, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// destructor of CrashRecoveryContextCleanupRegistrar removes cleanup code from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the current CrashRecoveryContext and the resource is reclaimed by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// destructor of std::unique&#95;ptr. If crash happens, destructors are not called</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and the resource is reclaimed by cleanup object registered in the recovery</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// context by the constructor of CrashRecoveryContextCleanupRegistrar.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Cleanup = CrashRecoveryContextDeleteCleanup&lt;T&gt; &gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/crashrecoverycontextcleanupregistrar"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/crashrecoverycontextcleanupregistrar/#a22b2744432d950424a79cce9424ff02e">CrashRecoveryContextCleanupRegistrar</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/crashrecoverycontextcleanup">CrashRecoveryContextCleanup</a> &#42;cleanup;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/crashrecoverycontextcleanupregistrar/#a22b2744432d950424a79cce9424ff02e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/crashrecoverycontextcleanupregistrar/#a22b2744432d950424a79cce9424ff02e">CrashRecoveryContextCleanupRegistrar</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;x)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    : cleanup(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfod/httpclient-cpp/#a0b91b2b50d54e38aa1e8e31e56c31357">Cleanup</a>::create(x)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (cleanup)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">      cleanup-&gt;getContext()-&gt;registerCleanup(cleanup);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/crashrecoverycontextcleanupregistrar/#a0cc8485800a00bacc1728815c0dc5220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/crashrecoverycontextcleanupregistrar/#a0cc8485800a00bacc1728815c0dc5220">unregister</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (cleanup &amp;&amp; !cleanup-&gt;cleanupFired)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">      cleanup-&gt;getContext()-&gt;unregisterCleanup(cleanup);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">    cleanup = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
